Name: Barrier Bow
LongDescription: Absorbs damage from Dark-type moves to restore HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Mime Jr. and Mr. Mime.  You can get a Barrier Bow at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Mime Key, a Mime Card, and a Bulwark Rock. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
